sentence.Network_en: Steve seemed to acquiesce in the decision.
sentence.Network_cn: 史蒂夫好像默认了这个决定。

sentence.Network_en: Her parents will never acquiesce in such an unsuitable marriage.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的父母决不会答应这门不相宜的婚事.

sentence.Network_en: Shakespeare did not acquiesce in discrepancy.
sentence.Network_cn: 莎士比亚对于分歧并不是采取默认的态度.

list.abs: response 反应response acquiescence 反应默许response adequacy 反应适切性
almost meanwhile , gu Ge announces the acquiescent position that becomes red fox browser serves a provider .几乎与此同时，谷歌宣布成为火狐浏览器的默认的位置服务提供商。
strike at the Honda plant could hardly have happened without official acquiescence .没有官方的默许，本田工厂是不太可能发生罢工的。
they acquiesced when bill quit harvard and then moved to albuquerque , new mexico , to start microsoft .当盖茨从哈佛退学，搬到新墨西哥州阿尔帕克基开创微软时，他们默许了。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin acquiescere, from ad- 'to, at' + quiescere 'to rest'

entry.def: If you acquiesce in something, you agree to do what someone wants or to accept what they do.

example.ex: Steve seemed to acquiesce in the decision...
example.tran: 史蒂夫好像默认了这个决定。

example.ex: He has gradually acquiesced to the demands of the opposition...
example.tran: 他渐渐顺从了反对派的要求。

sentences.sentence: "The Maestro assented to the request for an encore"

auth_sentence.content: Your interpretation of the science is what we should all acquiesce to.
auth_sentence.res_content: Your interpretation of the science is what we should all acquiesce to.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Your interpretation of the science is what we should all acquiesce to.

auth_sentence.content: If Tokyo does not acquiesce to Beijing demands to halt the investigation, Liu says, the dispute could escalate.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: If Tokyo does not acquiesce to Beijing demands to halt the investigation, Liu says, the dispute could escalate.

auth_sentence.content: I thought it was brilliant, but whether the Queen would acquiesce ... that was another matter.

stems_affixes.word_buile: qui静+escence开始……的→开始产生静→安静
ac给予+qui静+esce→给予[对方]静的回答

sentences.cn: 他们默默赞同那个决定。

sentences.en: After a lot of persuasion,he finally acquiesced.
sentences.cn: 经过多次劝说，他最终默许了。

sentences.en: Senior government figures must have acquired in the cover-up.
sentences.cn: 政府高级官员必然已经默许掩盖真相。
